label: Audio Track Data
description: Gets the value of the audio track data.

totalTime.label: total time
totalTime.description: Total time in seconds of the current song/track

audioTrackData.label: audio track data
audioTrackData.description: A JSON representation of the current audio track data

elapsedTime.label: elapsed time
elapsedTime.description: Elapsed time in seconds of the current song/track
